title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, March 18, 2022
description: "There is nothing but beauty — and beauty has only one perfect expression, Poetry. All the rest is a lie." -- French poet Stéphane Mallarmé, born on this day 1842.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "There is nothing but beauty — and beauty has only one perfect expression, Poetry. All the rest is a lie." -- French poet Stéphane Mallarmé, born on this day 1842.
